Package org.lwjgl.util.shaderc

Class Shaderc.Functions

  • java.lang.Object

  • Enclosing class:
    Shaderc
    public static final class Shaderc.Functions
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the function pointers loaded from the shaderc SharedLibrary.
